imdb.plot outline: In a city full of dreamers, romantics, and famewhores, some people in LA just want to make rent. Do Better is the story of three roommates trying to figure their lives out, at an age where their peers are settling into careers, getting married, and buying homes. If there's such thing as a third life crisis, Zora, Nadia, and Kiki are living it; working dead-end jobs, staying in a crowded apartment, and hoping for so much more. While so many are out here doing the most, these three are just trying to do better.
imdb.title: Do Better
plot: In a city full of dreamers, romantics, and famewhores, some people in LA just want to make rent. _Do Better_ (qv) is the story of three roommates trying to figure their lives out, at an age where their peers are settling into careers, getting married, and buying homes. If there's such thing as a third life crisis, Zora, Nadia, and Kiki are living it; working dead-end jobs, staying in a crowded apartment, and hoping for so much more. While so many are out here doing the most, these three are just trying to do better.::Christina Martin
